title: My Junior Still Hasn’t Killed Me - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Mature   Romance   Xianxia   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Ancient Times   Average-looking Protagonist   Black Belly   Caring Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cultivation   Dao Companion   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Early Romance   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Mob Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Outdoor Interc**rse   Popular Love Interests   Short Story   Social Outcasts   Straight Uke   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Younger Love Interests
author: Zi lu   子鹿
description:
[Prevent the novel villain, Gu XuanYan, from continuing his murdering, while also changing the trajectory of his life, and assisting him in ascending]
This was the mission Zhong Yan got after transmigrating into a novel he read the night before his test.

However, not only was his current identity just a wimpy, low-level sect senior, but also a no-name background character in the novel who should have died after witnessing Gu XuanYan’s first murder!

Can Zhong Yan prevent himself from being silenced by Gu XuanYan? Will he manage to complete his mission and get back home?>
